item.title: VCP5 Lab Tweak - vApp/HA for one?
item.description: I’ve been using my little HP Microserver and it’s a beauty. However I do have to keep powering it on and then connecting with vi client to the host then powering on the VC Appliance, then the virtual ESXi hosts, you know the drill………. So how to get them to autostart. Well it’s a simple option and to my mind it looks like a mix of a vApp and HA :-)
